授業目的: This course is for students to understand and apply their knowledge to academic research and academic communicative contexts.
到達目標:
1.Students will be able to instinctively employ critical thinking and study skills.
2.Students will be able to demonstrate proficient writing and research skills.
3.Students will be able to express critical opinions, lead group discussions, and participate in debates.
4.Students will be able to approach academic texts effectively, employing deep-reading strategies, scanning strategies, and annotation methods depending on the nature of the text and the reading context.
特記事項:

第1回:
General introduction to academic English including: Academic Word List (AWL) and critical thinking skills
All 14 sessions are conducted face-to-face.
第2回: Academic writing: sample model & discussion of style; Writing prompt; Academic language task
第3回: Academic reading: text analysis and structure; Reading skills introduction; Reading prompt
第4回: Reading skills session; Theme-based discussion; Academic language task
第5回: Reflective learning & study skills awareness through the use of electronic portfolios
第6回: Seminar skills: Cultures of learning; Academic language task
第7回: Reading skills session; Academic reading circles: Peer teaching
第8回:
Session 8-Seminar skills: Cultures of learning; E-portfolio: Study skills exercise; Academic language task
Research Presentation: Situation (background)
第9回:
Session 9-Reading skills session; Academic reading circles: Peer teaching

Research Presentation: Problem (issue)

Homework-Academic language task (One Hour)
第10回:
Critical thinking task; E-portfolio: Study skills exercise; Academic language task

Research Presentation: Solution (response)

Homework-Academic language task
第11回: Critical thinking task; Individual research project (Q & A: Analysis of Situation-Problem-Solution-Evaluation (SPRE) model
第12回: E-portfolio: Study skills exercise; Academic language task
第14回: Final research presentation: Evaluation (including all of the SPRE model)
